General.Name: Anhui Xinhua Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Xinhua Media Co., Ltd. engages in the cultural consumption, education services, supply chain management, and other culture-related businesses in China. It engages in the general distribution of books, newspapers, periodicals, textbooks, teaching aids, teaching materials, teaching supplements, and electronic publications, as well as agricultural specialty products, and cosmetics. The company also provides textbooks and teaching aids for primary and secondary schools; educational equipment; educational informatization; digital educational products; quality education courses; and other related educational services, as well as involved in the teacher training, research education, vocational education, preschool education, and other businesses. In addition, it offers supply chain procurement, warehousing and storage, distribution, and transportation services. Further, the company is involved in the film and television, and investment businesses; and operates Cube Game platform for gaming products distribution. The company was formerly known as Anhui Xinhua Distribution Group Limited. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hefei, China. Anhui Xinhua Media Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Anhui Xinhua Publishing (Group) Holdings Co., Ltd.
